title: # 429 - Shane Gillis & ME
description:
Today I talk to comedian Shane Gillis. We talk about Big Jay getting dosed, Shane’s SNL controversy, partying with Stanhope for a month, embarrassing emails, and much more!

This episode is brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill free at https://www.getquip.com/bertcast
